page.title: 07AGRICULTURE(int.pastoral)
page.content: This area is mostly suitable for in_ tensive arable farming;its mostly und_ er 250m;has a gentle relief enabling efficient use of large,labour_saving machinery(efficiency is increased by enlarging fields by removing hedges); mild temps even in Jan and July;an above average growing season;and 3.5hr of sun per day(for the ripening of cr_ ops).The high rainfall is combatted by the growing of crops more tolerant of wet conditions_oats and barley.This sort of farming takes place here most_ ly to provide winter fodder for live_ stock,not for marketing. Land is ploughed Nov_Dec;sowed and drilled from Dec_May;fertilised in Feb ;hoed from April_July;and harvested from June_Sept. (Maintenance of hedges and ditches takes place in the winter months).
